channel.title: U.S. Police Shooting News Tracker

item.title: 911 transcripts, documents detail chaotic scene after ICE agent fatally shot Renee Good
item.description: Renee Nicole Good suffered four gunshot wounds, according to newly released reports. Witnesses described the chaotic scene and said she was shot at 'point-blank' range.

item.title: The Campaign to Destroy Renee Good
item.description: After an ICE agent shot and killed the Minneapolis mother, conservative media launched an all-out attack on her reputation. Her identity as a queer woman was central to it.

item.title: Venezuelan shot in another federal agent action in U.S. Minneapolis
item.description: A U.S. federal agent shot and injured a Venezuelan man Wednesday night in Minneapolis, the largest city in the state of Minnesota, said the Department of Homeland Security (DHS).

item.title: Cynical reason Jacob Frey and Tim Walz chose now to stop calling for chaos
item.description: Minneapolis Mayor Jacob Frey launched a remarkable 180 late Wednesday: “I’m calling for peace,” he announced after an ICE agent shot an illegal Venezuelan who’d tried to murder him after a car chase.

item.title: New bill addresses police shootings of people in mental health crisis
item.description: State lawmakers and the family of a man fatally shot by Vermont State Police laid out a set of reforms they say could help prevent police shootings of people in crisis.

item.title: Minneapolis Police Chief: Rioters 'Are Engaging in Unlawful Acts'
item.description: Minneapolis Police Chief Brian O'Hara noted rioters gathered in response to Wednesday's officer-involved shooting were "engaging in unlawful acts." The post Minneapolis Police Chief: Rioters ‘Are Engaging in Unlawful Acts’ appeared first on Breitbart.

item.title: Tensions Flare in Minneapolis as Federal Agent Shoots A Venezuelan National Following Alleged Shovel and Broom Assault

item.title: Minneapolis anti-ICE protesters hurl fireworks, rocks at officers following shooting of Venezuelan migrant
item.description: A group of violent anti-ICE protesters hurled fireworks and rocks at officers on a Minneapolis block where a federal immigration agent shot a Venezuelan migrant in the leg hours earlier Wednesday night.

item.title: US federal agent shoots Venezuelan man in Minneapolis
item.description: A Venezuelan national ⁠pursued by US immigration agents during a "targeted" traffic stop in Minneapolis was shot in the leg by a federal officer, authorities said.

item.title: Federal Officer Shoots Person In Leg In Minneapolis, Officials Say
item.description: A federal officer has shot a person in the leg in Minneapolis after being attacked with a shovel during an arrest Wednesday, DHS said.
